name: constitutional-market-harmonics
description: Chaos-theoretic trading system optimizing ROI Ã— Constitutional Impact using strange attractors

scripts.build: echo 'Build complete - Constitutional AI server ready' && exit 0
scripts.db:init: node -e "const DatabaseManager = require('./src/database/DatabaseManager'); const db = new DatabaseManager(); db.initialize().then(() => console.log('Database initialized')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.db:migrate: node -e "const DatabaseManager = require('./src/database/DatabaseManager'); const db = new DatabaseManager(); db.runMigrations().then(() => console.log('Migrations completed')).catch(console.error);"
scripts.attractors:test: node -e "const AttractorManager = require('./src/attractors/AttractorManager'); const manager = new AttractorManager(); manager.initializeAttractors(); setInterval(() => { const signal = manager.generateEnsembleSignal(); console.log('Signal:', signal.decision, 'Confidence:', (signal.confidence*100).toFixed(1)+'%'); }, 1000);"
scripts.score:test: node -e "const ConstitutionalScorer = require('./src/constitutional/ConstitutionalScorer'); const scorer = new ConstitutionalScorer(); scorer.scoreCompany('AAPL').then(score => console.log('AAPL Score:', score.overall)).catch(console.error);"

author: Axiom X
